imdb.plot outline: A TV series about real pets and animals that make a difference in our lives. Stories about how a heart-meltingly lovable animal comforts and changes their owners live, sometimes even risking their lives to save the lives of their owners .....a lot of amazing stories. Each show has true heartwarming stories of pet heroics and fun facts.
imdb.title: My Pet Diaries
plot: A TV series about real pets and animals that make a difference in our lives. Stories about how a heart-meltingly lovable animal comforts and changes their owners live, sometimes even risking their lives to save the lives of their owners .....a lot of amazing stories. Each show has true heartwarming stories of pet heroics and fun facts.::Andy Chu
